title: Scientific Competency Enhancement Program through Overseas Training Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and flexible learning design based on overseas training experience
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers. Non-degree program applying experiential learning models in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment. Customized design simulating overseas training effects for science career-preparatory students.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze ≥3 global scientific research collaboration cases and write reports through simulations virtually experiencing overseas training environments
Apply intercultural communication skills to propose two or more scientific problem-solving strategies
Establish a career plan in the science field by incorporating peer feedback on experiential learning outcomes and reflecting on training experiences

resources: International case database in science fields
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
